title: Aw, Shucks. Best Of Nashville 2008 Results Are In!
author: Morgan Levy
excerpt: Thanks to our readers who braved the 146 questions before “Best Local Blog” on the Nashville Scene’s Best Of Nashville 2008 ballot. Your voices were heard and what do you know, it looks like we actually won! A big round of applause for all the winners this year, we’re proud to be included. Browse around and let us know what you think… Is Kali Yuga Yoga really the 2nd best place to meet single women? Sounds shady.  EDIT: Looks like […]
contentEncoded:
Thanks to our readers who braved the 146 questions before “Best Local Blog” on the Nashville Scene’s Best Of Nashville 2008 ballot. Your voices were heard and what do you know, it looks like we actually won! A big round of applause for all the winners this year, we’re proud to be included. Browse around and let us know what you think… Is Kali Yuga Yoga really the 2nd best place to meet single women? Sounds shady. 

EDIT: Looks like we won writer’s choice too, so that’s cool. Thanks to the Nashville Scene!
